name: PeopleSmart
overview:
PeopleSmart.com is a people search engine developed by the Redwood City, CA-based technology company Inflection. The website is recognized for providing users with access to contact information and public records directories. Millions of consumers, businesses, and professionals use it to find contact information, background reports, and more.

By aggregating billions of public records into one easy-to-use interface and managing the information with cutting-edge privacy technology, PeopleSmart makes it fast, easy, and safe for people to find and learn about one another online.

Consumers, businesses, and professionals use PeopleSmart to look for Contact Information, Reverse Phone Lookups, Email Searches, Background Checks, social networking profiles, criminal records, and more.

PeopleSmart also offers innovative new product lines that have not previously existed in the industry, such as the Court-Runner Network, which allows customers to retrieve non-digitized public records directly from county courthouses.
